parameters.name: DedicatedHostId
parameters.description: The ID of the dedicated host.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the dedicated host. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: TerminateSubscription
parameters.description:
The expiration time of the subscription dedicated host.

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.
